item.description: Ok, no more excuses! :) If you haven't come to one of these events...this September is the time! Join a group of local environmentalists and concerned folks, including Sierra Club leaders, at Orleans Bar and Restaurant on Wed., September 6th. Order a cold beverage, partake in some yummy appetizers, meet new people, learn from those who are already involved, and find out how you can contribute to the good fight going on to make our environment safe.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Sierra Club & Beer!
